title: Starbucks
description: Starbucks is located on BMO Student Street in Old Main, beside the theatre and across from academic advising.

title: OM Second Floor Lunchroom Microwave
description: Located in the first floor of Old Main, to reach it from the main foyer of the building go up the staircase, then enter the seating area right before "Bento Box"  and after "U&M Deli". The microwave is located on the right wall right behind the Bento Sushi, in OM2456.

title: House of Learning Ground Floor Microwave
description: Located in the ground floor of House of Learning, to reach it from the main Campus Commons entrance turn right before Tim Hortons and continue walking until the far corner of the building. The microwave is on a small table on the left.

title: Third Floor Lunchroom Microwave
description: Located on the third floor of the Arts & Education building, to reach it walk up either of the staircases to the left or right of the main Campus Commons entrance, then walk towards the center of the building. The microwave is in the corner with the Third Floor patio entrance, and may be hidden from view by the center wall if coming from the left side of the building.

title: Student Union Microwave
description: Located in the ground floor of the Student Union building, to reach it from either of the Student Union entrances, walk to the right of Common Grounds but not up the stairs. To reach it from the Campus Activity Centre entrance, walk right as much as possible and then continue walking forward until the Student Union washrooms. Turn the first left (not the stairs) after the washrooms. After reaching the end of the brief hallway, turn right again. The three microwaves are located right after the Club Lockers.

title: Science Building Microwave
description: Located in the second floor of the Science Building, in the second room to the right if entering from the entrance opposite the Gymnasium. Room S275. Two microwaves on the right wall.

title: Trades Upper Entrance
description: Located in the second floor of the Trade Building, right by the upper second front entrance by the Horticultural Gardens. The microwave is located immediately to the left after entering the building.

title: Trades Cafe
description: Located in the second floor of the Trades Building, right by the Trades Cafe in the upper floor of the rounded glass area of the building. 3 microwaves immediately outside the Trades Cafe lunch area.

title: Trades Ground Floor
description: Located in the ground floor of the Trades Building by the main entrance. From the main entrance, take the left hallway. The microwave is immediately after the first set of doors.

title: Piping Apprenticeship
description: From the main entrance, take the left hallway for roughtly half its length until you reach room TT129 (on your left). The microwave is visible from the hallway.

title: Electrical Apprenticeship
description: From the main entrance, take the left hallway for roughtly half its length until you reach room TT135 (on your left). The microwave is visible from the hallway.

title: Trades Ground Floor TT129
description: From the main entrance, take the left hallway for roughly two thirds of its length until you reach TT129 on the left. The microwave is located in the hallway.

title: Urban Market
description: The place to go on campus for pizza prepared on-site and baked in our open-flame oven. Check out the rotating themed hot entrée station or indulge in our pasta feature. Feeling a bit more unique? Build your own customizable salad or wrap with our selections of greens, toppings, grains, proteins, garnishes and dressing. Our Chop N Top station also features signature artisan style salads and wraps such as buffalo chicken cobb, kale chicken caesar, mediterranean and southwest ranch chicken.

title: The Den
description: This is a perfect location to host your next social gathering, whether it be a cocktail reception, holiday party or special event. Located on the second floor of the Campus Activity Centre, this 2,950-square-foot space can accommodate up to 220 people, making it ideal for smaller, intimate group functions.

title: Common Grounds
description: Common Grounds is your only student owned and operated coffee shop on campus striving for superior environmental and ethical standards. We offer fairly traded organic espresso, biodegradable cups and containers, living wages for student employees, and extended hours of service for when you need us most.

title: Scratch Café
description: Cafeteria run by students from the Culinary Arts program
